about_the_game:
The Oddsparks: An Automation Adventure - Supporter Pack includes optional cosmetic content for our biggest fans.

This DLC offers some exclusive customization and decoration items and is meant for players who really like the game and want to express their support.
These are ALL the items included in the pack:

Royal Outfit:
  • Royal Cape (Top)
  • Royal Brooch (Brooch)
  • Supporter Crown (Head Decoration)

Decorative golden statues of all Woodland Sparks:
  • Stumpy Spark Statue
  • Crafty Spark Statue
  • Carry Spark Statue
  • Loamy Spark Statue
  • Choppy Spark Statue

The items from the royal outfit have a fixed color scheme (red fabric + gold ornaments + pink gems) and can be used in the character editor right from the beginning.

The statues can be accessed as soon as you unlock the build menu during the tutorial.

Important: The main purpose of this DLC is to show your support for the game, the developer (Massive Miniteam), and the publisher (HandyGames). The items listed above are just a bonus to thank you for your continued support.
